Articles.Content: Yeah that didn't make sense BUT what I mean is I was wondering if there was a mod that lets you see planets from kerbin (if you look in the right direction)
Ok. The mod you are looking for is Kerbal Space Program. Yes that's right, you can see planets from Kerbin.

Get a telescope mod.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24639-0-21-1-Ordan-Industries-Telescope!-Last-Updated-August-23-2013!

I am not sure if it works in .22

Get a telescope mod.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24639-0-21-1-Ordan-Industries-Telescope!-Last-Updated-August-23-2013!

I am not sure if it works in .22

Cool ill have a look

The Ordan telescopes have been added to the Hullcam mod, and are currently supported in .22 under that developer.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365-0-22-Hullcam-VDS-Added-Ordan-Telescopes-and-mapview-fix-Updated-25-Oct

The original developer of the telescopes moved on, and gave the mod to the new developer to continue working on it.
